instructions:
An alternative character sheet for Degenesis.
Tries to emulate the [official character sheet](http://sixmorevodka.com/degenesis/character-en/) without sacrificing usability.

Please report any bugs or suggestions on the projects [issue tracker](https://github.com/henry4k/roll20-character-sheets/issues).
If you don't have a GitHub account you may also send [me](https://app.roll20.net/users/3700129) a message on Roll20.
